metadata.title: CVE-2020-17482 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue has been found in PowerDNS Authoritative Server before 4.3.1 where an authorized user with the ability to insert crafted records into a zone might be able to leak the content of uninitialized memory.

criterions.comment: pdns package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.1-1').
